name: 15-piece_Pink_Gold_Floral_Pot,_cups_and_Saucers_Tea_Set
reviews: I loved how the product looked online. When I got it, the first thing I noticed was its weight. The cups, plates, tea pot was so heavy. I owned many porcelain sets and they were never so heavy. I don't want this material, even if it is porcelain, which I doubt. Also, the painting is not real, it is tape. Some of the flowers are not clear or fading. As for the style, it is very cute. I wish the quality would be better. I am returning it. Disappointing.
its so little set, looks like set for children to play. dont have a time to return.
Very lovely yet the cups/saucers are smaller than I thought.
description: Intricate pink and gold floral designs embellish and set apart this unique coffee set. Included are six cups and saucers, a coffee pot, creamer container and a sugar container.Type: Coffee setBrand: Three StarMaterial: PorcelainPattern: Pink and Gold FloralCare instructions: Hand wash only (for lasting quality)Set includes:Six (6) 6-ounce cupsSix (6) saucers (6 inches in diameter)One (1) 24-ounce coffee pot (8 inches high)One (1) creamer (4.5 inches high x 4 inches wide x 4 inches deep)One (1) sugar container (5.5 inches high x 6 inches wide x 6 inches long)MaterialPorcelainTypeCoffee PotsSet Include5 PieceCare InstructionHand WashColorPink
